name: Combatic Space Chace!
description:
you are being chased at high speeds through space.they are gaining on you! thankfully you can shoot back! sadly your weapon is experimental, meaning it over heats easily, witch slows down your fire time. to cool down your weapon, do not shoot.

on computer, use left and right arrows to move or A and D. to shoot, press space or W.

on touch devices touch and hold the direction you want to go, initial tap shoots.

The original publication can be found at https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/combatic-space-chace ,This is just a re upload of an old game
